website_summaries.verdict: The light, clean, and long-lasting scent of Gain makes this a great option for users who want a strong detergent that leaves clothes smelling great.
pros: We love the smell of Gain's original scent detergent
Unlike some detergents that overpower with their smell, Gain's scent manages to be light while still smelling noticeably fresh
Scent can last on clothes for up to an impressive two weeks
cons: On lighter wash cycles, this detergent may leave a slight residue that requires additional wash time to remove

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is cool!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the clothes just fine, but what is interesting is that the scent "revitalizes" when you rub the fabric of the clothing. I noticed that if you smell the fabric, it has a very mild at best scent as you wear the clothing. If you rub the fabric, the scent of the detergent comes to life and it smells really good. This could be days/weeks after it has come out of the wash. Not sure if it is the heat generated from rubbing the fabric or just the movement. Neat stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: We have used liquid Gain for decades!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Gain for decades. I am a repeat customer. I use the Pods for convenience. I bought this for my husband. He loves the liquid. He swears by it. He isn’t a fan of the Pods. He thinks the Pods are too expensive and do not clean the clothes as well as the liquid. We will always buy the liquid for our household. I recommend the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Gin

customer_reviews.title: A brand that has stood the test of time
customer_reviews.text: I have used again off and on through the years due to its reliability to always clean my laundry; its gentleness, it’s fresh scent and it’s a brand I can trust.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love my gain detergent great size for the price very thick so doesn't take much
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: It's laundry soap....
customer_reviews.text: And yes...the aroma booster does keep our clothes smelling fresh while in the closet!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great job on clothes
customer_reviews.text: I love gain, cleans clothes, leaves a fresh clean scent.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Economical choice.
customer_reviews.text: Though not specific for sensitive skin, this detergent doesn't cause any irritations. The fresh scent lasts a little after a wash and it's a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sheveen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: I like the lasting scent of Gain and the way it cleans.
customer_reviews.author: Orchid 14

customer_reviews.title: I like the scent
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well and I get a lot of compliments on the mild send
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: A product that that lives up to its name
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance that stays in your clothes Your clothes are really clean! As far as I'm concerned it's by far the best detergent out for money
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and amount this detergent has. Smells amazing and cleans clothes well.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scent and keeps clothes clean and fresh!
customer_reviews.text: We love this detergent. It Has a soft scent and easy on all clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: Package came on time. It was package good, no spills. Love this product, love the scent. Good value for your money. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: Always liked the product. Love the fact that it is available on Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K.

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I received two small bottles instead of the one pictured and it came in a Walmart box. Walmart would have been cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Love Gain - great scent and really cleans my clothes!
customer_reviews.author: qaz  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two only received one. Thought it might be back ordered. But apparently not
customer_reviews.author: Dempsey Henderson

customer_reviews.title: When you have to do laundry 3-4 times a week you need soap that works
customer_reviews.text: I order this because it is easy to use, and I order several bottles at a time, (so the care givers won't run out as soon). Works great, Cleans great, and is easy on our budget.
customer_reviews.author: D. at LLRC

customer_reviews.title: Soap.
customer_reviews.text: Buying in line is more expensive. I had forgotten to pickup on my last trip to warehouse store and just ordered it. Took several weeks to arrive. Funny thing it came from the same warehouse store that I failed to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Love this Scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of this Gain. Searched for best price all around and ended up to be Amazon. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa-Nashville

customer_reviews.title: No fragrance
customer_reviews.text: None of the scent you expect to get when using Gain.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dingus

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion it is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Better than using the pods! You can measure better, without over or under doing it!
customer_reviews.author: verified customer

customer_reviews.title: Nobody in my household is allergic to Gain.
customer_reviews.text: All of the premium detergents get my clothes clean but I guess it's the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

product_meta.title: Ultra Concentrated & Aroma Boosted New Gain Original Liquid Laundry Detergent 5.91 L / 200 Fl. Oz - 146 Loads (2X Ultra Concentrated)
product_meta.description:
Ultra Concentrated & Aroma Boosted New Gain Original Liquid Laundry Detergent 5.91 L / 200 Fl. Oz - 146 Loads (2X Ultra Concentrated)

Add Gain Original Liquid Laundry Detergent to every load of laundry for a fresh and soothing scent that lasts for up to six weeks. Gain features Perfume Micro Capsules that gradually break and release scent while you wear your clothes, so you're always getting bursts of freshness each day. The concentrated Gain HE detergent lifts away dirt and stains like blood, coffee, food, grease and odors from your clothes and bedding. 

To use, simply add one capful to any full washload in both HE and regular washing machines. This 150 fl oz bottle of Gain liquid detergent can yield up to 96 loads of laundry. For more of the scent you love, try adding Gain Fireworks and Gain Fabric Softener to your wash; additional Gain products are sold separately.
feature_bullets: Liquid laundry detergent with brilliant cleaning performance that leaves behind a refreshing Gain Original scent
Smells great because it cleans great
6 weeks of freshness from wash until wear. Includes 200 fl. oz. of laundry detergent
Freshness of 1 cap of Gain liquid laundry detergent equals 1 bottle of the leading baking soda detergent*
